node.display_long_description:
Have the time of your life working out!

Get full-body cardio workouts synched to the beat of your favorite music. 

Start your free trial today!* 

ALWAYS NEW
Daily releases added to a library of hundreds of workouts

REAL FITNESS
Get face-to-face with expert coaches, strengthen every muscle group & build cardio endurance

THE BEST MUSIC
Workouts mapped to hundreds of songs from your favorite artists

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Immerse yourself in stunning destinations from all over the world and beyond

SHARE AT HOME
Free profiles for roommates and family on your Quest (4 total)

IN-DEPTH TRACKING
Earn badges and streaks, monitor your heart rate and crush your goals

Set up your Membership on the Supernatural Companion App (iOS & Android) and choose from Monthly and Annual Plans.

*Limited time offer. $0 for duration of free trial, $19/month or $179/year thereafter. Cancel at any time. Terms apply. Go to getsupernatural.com for more details.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
General bug fixes, stability improvements, and tweaks :)

Need help, or have a suggestion? Reach out to us at support@getsupernatural.com

nodes.title: ICYMI: Women’s History Month
nodes.body_text:
This Women’s History Month we packed our workouts with the sounds of some iconic female artists — from Megan thee Stallion to Stevie Nicks and everything in between.

If you missed any of our WHM workouts, it’s never too late. Jump into your headset to celebrate Women’s History anytime on Supernatural.

TAKE THE STAGE: REBEL BELLES
Get ready to rock in this workout tuned to epic live performances. Featuring music by Pretenders, Stevie Nicks, Heart, Pat Benatar and Joan Jett & the Blackhearts.

RAPATTACK: WOMEN ARE POWERFUL
Own your feminine power, independence and sexuality in this explosive Hip Hop workout. Featured artists: PARRI$, Cardi B, Nicki Minaj and Megan Thee Stallion

SWEATY FLANNEL: RIOT GRRRL
Let out your inner punk rocker in this tribute to the women of 90s Alternative Rock! Featured artists: Siouxsie and the Banshees, L7, Elastica, Hole, Sonic Youth and Babes In Toyland.

SUPER MONSTER: NONSTOP POP
Get ready for 45-minutes of nonstop Pop in this energizing marathon of fresh female vocalists. Featured artists: Billie Eilish, Ariana Grande, Allesia Cara, Anne-Marie, Tones and I, Ava Max, Dua Lipa, ALMA, Ellie Goulding, Jessie J, Katy Tiz, Hailee Steinfield and Bishop Briggs.

THE DROP: BEAST BABE
Calling all beast babes! Push yourself to the limit in this deeper mix of Trap, Dubstep and Electro from female DJs, producers and vocalists. Featured artists: Anna Lunoe, Alison Wonderland, Zeds Dead and Nervo.

SKINNY JEANS AND RIPPED SEAMS: RIPPED AND STRONG
Listen as the worlds of Indie and Electronic collide in this mid-00s throwback. Featured artists: La Roux, The Knife, Tegan and Sara, CSS and Goldfrapp.

SUPERFREAK: DEDICATION
Get on your dancing shoes - this throwback Soul playlist is the perfect mood booster. Featured artists: Etta James, Martha Reeves & the Vandellas, Thelma Houston, Chaka Khan, Diana Ross, Sister Sledge.

FUEGO
Heat up the dance floor with our Latin music debut! Feel the fire in this femme-forward Latin Pop workout as we Celebrate Women's History. Featured artists: ROSALíA, Jesse & Joy, KAROL G., INNA and Jenn Morel.

SMOOTH SAILING: EMBODY THE POWER
Sail off into the sunset with this Soft Rock stress reliever. Featured artists: Bonnie Raitt, Judy Collins, Carly Simon, Fleetwood Mac, Joni Mitchell and Helen Reddy.

HOEDOWN THROWDOWN: BLESS HER HEART
Get your cowgirl boots on — this kickin' Country workout is the perfect confidence booster. Featured artists: Bonnie Raitt, Loretta Lynn, Reba McEntire, Faith Hill, and Kacey Musgraves.

nodes.title: This Leg Day is for Pros Only
nodes.body_text:
We leveled up our highest intensity WOD by adding in some lower body moves: Quick Feet and Leg Lifts. This workout is an all-out glute and quad focused “Pros Only” where you’ll dive into intense and complex patterns meant to ignite your leg day.

Find Pros Only: Glutacious in the Supernatural Workout Library !

node.reviewDescription: I canceled my gym membership at planet fitness for this. I used to do the beachbody programs when I was younger and I could always stay dedicated and lose weight and tone up. I'm 32 now and had been battling with depression and anxiety, the pandemic certainly didn't help and I gained about 70 pounds. I was the biggest I had ever been. Beachbody programs couldn't keep me motivated anymore. Felt like a chore and I'd often talk myself out of it. I purchased an Oculus Quest 2 in January of this year. And as soon as I played this I feel in love. I have never sweated so much in my life! Not even running on the treadmill at PF. I was playing and hours would go by and the whole time I'm doing HIIT, squats, lunges, my shoulders, biceps, triceps, everything would be on fire but I was just having so much fun! It's been 2.5 months and I have lost so many inches off of my body! My husband's noticed along with family and friends. I just added in some weight training at home and I am hooked. My mood has improved and the meditation is also another amazing benefit to this app! The locations, incredible, trainers, epic, the benefits...just insane! I think it's worth $19 a month. I'm actually purchasing it for a year next month. I'm addicted and I'm so happy with how it's making my arms and body look. I'm so much stronger for everyday things and I don't get out of breath. I have more energy. And when people ask me what I'm doing, I get say Supernatural on VR. It's hilarious to see people's faces 😂

developerResponse.body: So cool to hear this, thank you for sharing. Glad to hear that Supernatural has been a big motivator in your fitness journey and that you're already seeing some awesome results. Keep up the great work and thanks again for being part of the Supernatural community! :)
